article_title: Jon Stewart Found The Perfect Guy To Run HealthCare.gov
article_text:
Jofi Joseph anonymously operated a popular and uber-snarky White House insider Twitter account, @Natsecwonk, for years before his superiors finally caught up with him. Don’t worry, Joseph wasn’t sharing national secrets or classified information or anything, just making fun of his elected officials and their staffs for being fat and stupid. And everyone in Hollywood for Ugly People seemingly couldn’t get enough of his dirt, despite the lack of crudely painted on dongs.

Joseph’s actions weren’t exactly “ethical” but he did demonstrate the ability to effectively operate something on a computer and draw eyeballs, which gave Jon Stewart and The Daily Show team an idea…

article_summary:
Don’t worry, Joseph wasn’t sharing national secrets or classified information or anything, just making fun of his elected officials and their staffs for being fat and stupid.
Jofi Joseph anonymously operated a popular and uber-snarky White House insider Twitter account, @Natsecwonk, for years before his superiors finally caught up with him.
Joseph’s actions weren’t exactly “ethical” but he did demonstrate the ability to effectively operate something on a computer and draw eyeballs, which gave Jon Stewart and The Daily Show team an idea…
And everyone in Hollywood for Ugly People seemingly couldn’t get enough of his dirt, despite the lack of crudely painted on dongs.
